articles.description: Cricket Australia, which is not eligible for the federal government's JobKeeper support program, has approached a supermarket giant and one of its sponsors to help with temporary jobs for its laid off staff.
articles.content:
Cricket Australia has approached supermarket giant and one of its sponsors Woolworths to help with temporary jobs for its staff laid off until the end of June due to a financial crunch caused by the coronavirus pandemic.

articles.title: Don't hoard in the cupboards or the mind: Ravi Shastri on life in lockdown - Firstpost
articles.description: Ravi Shastri: Not a shot has been fired, not a bullet discharged, not a stone thrown. Not one of the high-tech weapons in the arsenal of several nations has been used. And yet, the whole world has been paralysed by a tiny but deadly virus.
articles.content:
The damage wrecked globally by an invisible, common enemy will force people to look at life in a whole new perspective, Ravi Shastri is convinced.
